response.overview: Wang Cheng opened an auto repair store, specializing in car repair, but one day the store received a plutonium, in order to investigate the origin of this plutonium, Wang Cheng asked his good friends Daliu and Da Sheng to help. Wang Cheng had a lot of nightmares, thought he was haunted by dead girls, the results of the dream woke up really received a hooking order, Wang Cheng was scared to death on the spot, and finally found out after investigation, it was Wang Cheng's cheating wife used Wang Cheng's nightmare weakness, scared Wang Cheng to death, and finally Wang Cheng's wife was brought to justice and got the sanctions he deserved.
response.title: Gou Hun Ling
